tool_description: This API can be used to inquire about prices for real-time flights, hotels, rental cars etc form website like SkyScanner.
name: Sky Scrapper
title: Sky Scrapper

api_list.name: searchFlightsEverywhere

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description:
Travel date.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: fromId
required_parameters.description: The `fromId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/flights/searchAirport`**(searchAirport)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: `currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The preferred region's country/market code. `market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: `locale` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

api_list.name: searchFlights

required_parameters.name: toId
required_parameters.description: The `toId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/flights/searchAirport`**(searchAirport)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description:
Travel date.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: fromId
required_parameters.description: The `fromId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/flights/searchAirport`**(searchAirport)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

optional_parameters.name: carriers
optional_parameters.description:
Filter the results by carriers. Enter the ID for the carriers. If there are multiple 'carriers' to be submitted, they should be comma-separated.
Eg: `-32119,-32213`

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description: The number of children between the **ages** of `1` and `18`.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: `currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: cabinClass
optional_parameters.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either economy, premium_economy, business or first.

optional_parameters.name: stops
optional_parameters.description:
Number of stops
Non Stop: 0
One Stop: 1
Two Stops: 2
Example:
If the search result contains flights that are `non stops` or have `two stops`, pass in `0,2` as parameter value.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: `limit` the number of records in the result.

optional_parameters.name: infants
optional_parameters.description: The number of infants. Children under the **age** of `12` months.

optional_parameters.name: co2
optional_parameters.description:
Flight with lower CO2 emission.
1 = True
0 = False

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: This parameter orders result by best, cheapest, fastest,outbound_take_off_time,outbound_landing_time,return_take_off_time or return_landing_time flights.

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

optional_parameters.name: returnDate
optional_parameters.description:
Return date.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: `locale` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The preferred region's country/market code. `market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

api_list.name: Get Config
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sky-scrapper1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getConfig"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sky-scrapper1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description: To check if server is up and running

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sky-scrapper1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sky-scrapper1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Location to Lat Long

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Names of locations, apartment, address, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

api_list.name: getNearbyMap

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: Location latitude.

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: Location longitude.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: `locale` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: `currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The preferred region's country/market code. `market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: cityId
optional_parameters.description: `cityId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/hotels/searchHotelOrDestination`**(searchHotelOrDestination)** endpoint in **Hotels** as `entity_id` inside **location** object where `entity_type` is equals to `City`

api_list.name: getHotelsByCoordinates

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: **Latitude** of the searched location. `latitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/locationToLatLong`**(Location to Lat Long)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: **Longitude** of the searched location. `longitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/locationToLatLong`**(Location to Lat Long)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

required_parameters.name: sorting
required_parameters.description: This parameter orders result by BEST,PRICE_HIGH_TO_LOW,PRICE_LOW_TO_HIGH,DISTANCE_FROM_LOCATION,GUEST_RATING or STARS_5_TO_1,STARS_1_TO_5 hotels.

required_parameters.name: checkoutDate
required_parameters.description:
The date of **departure** or **check-out**.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: checkinDate
required_parameters.description:
The date on which you will **arrive** or **check-in**.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

optional_parameters.name: pageNo
optional_parameters.description: The page number.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: `locale` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The preferred region's country/market code. `market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: `currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

api_list.name: getAmenities

required_parameters.name: flightId
required_parameters.description: `flightId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/flights/searchFlights`**(searchFlights)** or `api/v1/flights/searchFlightsMultiStops`**(searchFlightsMultiStops)** endpoints in Flights collection inside `itineraries` object as `id`.

api_list.name: getPriceCalendar

required_parameters.name: fromId
required_parameters.description: The `fromId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/flights/searchAirport`**(searchAirport)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

required_parameters.name: toId
required_parameters.description: The `toId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/flights/searchAirport`**(searchAirport)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description:
Travel date.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: `currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: `locale` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: returnDate
optional_parameters.description:
Return date.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The preferred region's country/market code. `market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

api_list.name: getPrice

required_parameters.name: checkinDate
required_parameters.description:
The date on which you will **arrive** or **check-in**.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: checkoutDate
required_parameters.description:
The date of **departure** or **check-out**.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: hotelId
required_parameters.description: `hotelId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/hotels/searchHotels`**(searchHotels)** or `api/v1/hotels/getHotelsByCoordinates`**(getHotelsByCoordinates)** endpoints in **Hotels** collection inside `hotels` object as `hotelId`. OR from `api/v1/hotels/getSimilarHotels`**(getSimilarHotels)** endpoints in **Hotels** as `hotelId`

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description: The number of guests who are `18 years` of **age** or **older**. The **default** value is set to `1`.

optional_parameters.name: entityId
optional_parameters.description: `entityId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/hotels/searchHotelOrDestination`**(searchHotelOrDestination)** endpoint in **Hotels** as `entityId` OR `api/v1/hotels/getLocationByCoordinates`**(getLocationByCoordinates)** endpoint in **Hotels** inside `city/district` object as `id `

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: `locale` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The preferred region's country/market code. `market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: `currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: rooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of **rooms** that are required. The **default** value is set to `1`.

optional_parameters.name: childrenAges
optional_parameters.description:
The number of **children**, including **infants**, who are under `18`.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
`childrenAges: 0,1,17`

api_list.name: getHotelDetails

required_parameters.name: hotelId
required_parameters.description: `hotelId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/hotels/searchHotels`**(searchHotels)** or `api/v1/hotels/getHotelsByCoordinates`**(getHotelsByCoordinates)** endpoints in **Hotels** collection inside `hotels` object as `hotelId`. OR from `api/v1/hotels/getSimilarHotels`**(getSimilarHotels)** endpoints in **Hotels** as `hotelId`

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The preferred region's country/market code. `market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: `currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: `locale` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: entityId
optional_parameters.description: `entityId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/hotels/searchHotelOrDestination`**(searchHotelOrDestination)** endpoint in **Hotels** as `entityId` OR `api/v1/hotels/getLocationByCoordinates`**(getLocationByCoordinates)** endpoint in **Hotels** inside `city/district` object as `id `

api_list.name: searchCars

required_parameters.name: dropOffDate
required_parameters.description:
Drop off date
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: pickUpTime
required_parameters.description:
Pick up time
Format: **HH:MM**
*Note: The format of time is 24 hours.*

required_parameters.name: pickUpEntityId
required_parameters.description: `pickUpEntityId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/searchLocation`**(searchLocation)** endpoint in **Car Hire** collection as `entity_id`.

required_parameters.name: dropOffEntityId
required_parameters.description: `dropOffEntityId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/searchLocation`**(searchLocation)** endpoint in **Car Hire** collection as `entity_id`.

required_parameters.name: pickUpDate
required_parameters.description:
Pick up date
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: dropOffTime
required_parameters.description:
Drop off time
Format: **HH:MM**
*Note: The format of time is 24 hours.*

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: `locale` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The preferred region's country/market code. `market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: `currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

api_list.name: getReviews

required_parameters.name: hotelId
required_parameters.description: `hotelId` can be extracted from the `api/v1/hotels/searchHotels`**(searchHotels)** or `api/v1/hotels/getHotelsByCoordinates`**(getHotelsByCoordinates)** endpoints in **Hotels** collection inside `hotels` object as `hotelId`. OR from `api/v1/hotels/getSimilarHotels`**(getSimilarHotels)** endpoints in **Hotels** as `hotelId`

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The preferred region's country/market code. `market` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: pageNo
optional_parameters.description: The page number.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: This parameter orders result by RECOMMENDED,RATING_HIGH_TO_LOW,RATING_LOW_TO_HIGH or MOST_RECENT reviews.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: `locale` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: `currency` can be retrieved from `api/v1/getConfig`**(Get Config)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.
